tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID NOT NULL,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    feedback_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    satisfaction_rating INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE ChatbotLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    chatbot_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MarketingStrategies (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FeedbackAnalysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_id INT,
    sentiment TEXT,
    keywords JSONB,
    analysis_date DATE
);
